= *iRINGTools* 2.00.04.3020 =

A patch release of [http://code.google.com/p/iring-tools/wiki/ReleaseNotice_204 iRINGTools 2.0] that includes bug fixes.  

The download is available [http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools-2.0.4.zip here].  
The SDK can be downloaded from [http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools-SDK-2.0.4.zip here]

[http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools_Installation_Guide_v2.0.1.pdf Installation Guide]

[http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools_Users_Guide_v2.0.1.pdf Users Guide]

[http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools_SDK_Guide_v2.0.2.pdf SDK Guide]

== New Features ==
 * Support classification template
 * Support related data objects for RDF and Part-7 XML
 
== Bugs Fixed ==
 * Resolve related individual URIs for RDF and Part-7 XML
 * Handle key properties on outbound RDF and Part-7 XML and inbound sparql
